item.title: Here's How to Combine Storytelling and Data to Produce Persuasive Content
item.description:
Here's How to Combine Storytelling and Data to Produce Persuasive Content

Ever thought about what really sticks out in your audience's minds? Hint: it's not the hard facts alone. Combining data and storytelling can make your brand's content stick out in a meaningful way; Nichole DeMer√© shows you how in today's post.

item.title: The Brand Halo Effect: Does Brand Awareness Impact Organic Search Rankings?
item.description:
The Brand Halo Effect: Does Brand Awareness Impact Organic Search Rankings?

"The extent to which consumers are familiar with the qualities or image of a particular brand of goods or services." Oxford English Dictionary's definition of brand awareness How does anyone, not least a search engine, quantify brand awareness?

item.title: How Amazon's Alexa is bringing intelligent assistance into the mainstream
item.description:
How Amazon's Alexa is bringing intelligent assistance into the mainstream

To paraphrase William Gibson, "The future is already here and, thanks to intelligent assistants (IA), it is more evenly distributed than ever before." Based on our spoken input, mobile personal assistants (like Siri and Google Now) answer questions, navigate routes, and organize meetings.

item.title: How Content Curation Can Position Your Entire Organization as Thought Leaders
item.description:
How Content Curation Can Position Your Entire Organization as Thought Leaders

Let's be honest ... in the world of online marketing, the problem for you and your audience is not lack of content. It isn't even lack of great content. Each day humans add 2.5 quintillion bytes of data to the internet, publish two million new blog posts, and upload over 100K hours of video to YouTube.

item.title: Content Marketing In E-Commerce
item.description:
Content Marketing In E-Commerce

Content marketing has been proven, time and time again, to be a necessity in today's e-commerce landscape. In fact, content marketing results in 55% higher website traffic and 97% more inbound links, while being the primary factor behind up to 50% of purchasing decisions. Not bad, right?

item.title: #BigIdeas2016: Content Strategy - Setting the Narrative Table
item.description:
#BigIdeas2016: Content Strategy - Setting the Narrative Table

In this series, professionals predict the ideas and trends that will shape 2016. Read the posts here, then write your own (use #BigIdeas2016 in your piece).

item.title: FRUGAL BUSINESS: HubSpot Academy Inbound Certification Notes: Part 1
item.description:
FRUGAL BUSINESS: HubSpot Academy Inbound Certification Notes: Part 1

HubSpot is obviously one of the most popular and rapidly growing digital marketing software companies out there. I am a big fan because of their Inbound Marketing expertise and their Boston roots. I've been an inbound marketer since 2009 because I would much rather educate a prospect than force traditional marketing methods down their throats.

item.title: Facebook Website Custom Audiences: A Definitive Guide for Remarketing
item.description:
Facebook Website Custom Audiences: A Definitive Guide for Remarketing

For more on the upgraded Website Custom Audience pixel, read this post.] The power of Facebook ads is found within the targeting. I don't care how perfect the ad copy, imagery, bidding and optimization are, it's imperative that you target the people most likely to perform your desired action.

item.title: An Algorithm Based Timeline is Coming to Instagram
item.description:
An Algorithm Based Timeline is Coming to Instagram

The Instagram timeline is about to change in a huge was as an algorithmic news feed is in testing.

item.title: Using content to convert in e-commerce
item.description:
Using content to convert in e-commerce

Published on March 21, 2016 by E-commerce doesn't work unless it goes side by side with great content. You may have heard about "content-driven commerce websites", "e-commerce content marketing" and "the fusion of content and commerce". Well, it all comes down to the same thing.
